Sentencas: Simulations of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) have been carried out by considering the geometry of the single cell comprises an air channel, fuel channel, anode, cathode and electrolyte layers.
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The numerical results were validated with experimental data.
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The current density, gas flow behavior, temperature and species concentration are analyzed.
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The presented simulation data shows a close correlation to the experimental data with only a minimal deviation of 7.27% on average in the current-potential plot.
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The results from the simulation show that an increase of inlet temperature resulted in a decrease of current density, power and thermal efficiency.
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The mass flow rate of fuel affects directly to the current density and power density.
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: However, the thermal efficiency is decreased as the mass flow rate is increased.
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The maximum thermal efficiency of 49.16% could be achieved for the case of fuel and air inlet temperature of 873 K and the fuel mass flow rate of 3.202 x 10(-7) kg s(-1).
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The increase or decrease of cell length results in the area of electrochemical reaction.
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: From our modeling, a longer cell yields larger thermal efficiency but lower current density.
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The results of this work can be used for studying the cell behavior of a tubular SOFC and to help develop efficient fuel cell designs.
Titulo: The simulations of tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)
